Вы, надо полагать, знаете, что каждое вещество, охлаждаясь, уменьшается в объёме?","reason":"Paragraph mentions the character Знайка."},{"pointer":"1.1.1.p41","excerpt":"– Надо полагать, знаю, – сердито буркнул профессор.","reason":"Paragraph mentions the character профессор."}],"progress":"Found three new paragraphs with character mentions.","needMoreContext":false}","reasoning":"We need to extract candidate evidence relevant to the task: collect all character mentions across the book; return every paragraph where a person appears.
